Updated November     pm



Prince Harry failed to score in a televised penalty shootout competition over the weekend PERIOD

The Duke of Sussex joined German defence minister Boris Pistorius on ZDF to promote the Invictus Games which are taking place in Dusseldorf and the pair went headtohead in a fun contest but the 38yearold royal failed to hit the target at all PERIOD

Before the competition began Harry asked 

The host told him  prompting laughter and applause in the studio PERIOD

And then told he had to start he asked 

To more laughter he was told 

The reluctant royal stepped up to the playing area and playfully told the cameraman 

After coming close on his three attempts Boris then stepped up and hit two balls into the target PERIOD

Both Harry and the minister missed their second round of shots PERIOD

A joint team comprising Invictus Games Angelo Anderson und Jens Niemeyer also failed to score PERIOD

Taking the result in good spirits Harry joked the politician could find himself a new career PERIOD

He quipped 

As there wasnt a Germany shirt in the studio the hosts borrowed a scarf from a fan of Mainz   the team where Liverpools Jurgen Klopp began his coaching career  and urged the prince to put it on PERIOD

Harry first asked 

He then smiled broadly as he donned the scarf and was told  PERIOD

During an interview on the show Harry  who has Prince Archie four and Princess Lilibet two with wife Meghan Duchess of Sussex  admitted establishing the Invictus Games a competition for sick and wounded military personnel and veterans had been a  for him PERIOD

The former soldier said To be honest with you setting up the Invictus Games was a bit of a lifeline for me PERIOD

I didnt realise it at first but being in this community hearing a lot of stories there were a lot of similarities. originally published on celebretainment.com part of the BLOX Digital Content Exchange PERIOD

Never miss our photos stories and videos PERIOD
title: Prince Harry fails to score in penalty competition | Entertainment | msuexponent.com
